thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UUUM says business and capital alliance with social video marketing firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UUUM says business and capital alliance with social video marketing firm
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - UUUM Co Ltd
* Says it plans to sign business and capital alliance agreement with a Tokyo-based social video marketing firm in late January
* Through capital alliance, it plans to acquire 66,667 shares (14.6 percent stake) of the Tokyo-based firm for 100 million yen
* Through business alliance, two entities will cooperate on influencer marketing business and development of coâ€™s creator and content in overseas
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/QxBryX
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
